votes.question: On the Amendment
votes.question_text: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 65 to S. 1 (Strengthening America's Security in the Middle East Act of 2019)
votes.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the United States faces continuing threats from terrorist groups operating in Syria and Afghanistan and that the precipitous withdrawal of United States forces from either country could put at risk hard-won gains and United States national security.
